footer.description: Ime ka asụsụ Africa nwee ike site na ọchịchị nkewa.

hero.title: Nabata na AFRILingua
hero.subtitle: Ime ka asụsụ Africa nwee ike site na ọchịchị nkewa
hero.description: Sonye na DAO anyị iji chebe, kwalite, ma kwalite asụsụ Africa site na iji teknụzụ blockchain na atumatu obodo.

register.title: Sonye na AFRILingua DAO
register.subtitle: Họrọ ọrụ gị ma malite inye aka n'ichekwa asụsụ Africa

form.success: Ndebanye aha gara nke ọma! Anyị ga-akpọtụrụ gị n'oge na-adịghị anya.
form.error: Ihe mmejọ mere. Biko nwaa ọzọ.

coreTeam.title: Onye otu Core Team
coreTeam.description: Duru atumatu atụmatụ ma mee ka ọhụụ DAO gaa n'ihu.

ambassador.title: Onye nnọchiteanya
ambassador.description: Nọchite anya AFRILingua n'obodo gị ma gbasaa mmata.

validator.title: Onye nkwado
validator.description: Kwado ọdịnaya asụsụ ma hụ na ụkpụrụ dị mma.

contributor.title: Onye na-enye aka
contributor.description: Nye akaere asụsụ, nsụgharị, na ọdịnaya.

technicalPlayer.title: Onye ọrụ teknụzụ
technicalPlayer.description: Wulite ngwaọrụ, akụrụngwa, na ngwọta teknụzụ.

hero.title: Banyere AFRILingua DAO
hero.subtitle: Ichekwa na ime ka asụsụ Africa nwee ike maka ọgbọ ndị ga-abịa

mission.title: Ozi Anyị
mission.description: AFRILingua DAO bụ ọgbakọ na-achị onwe ya nke a na-etinye aka na ichekwa, iweghachi ume, na ime ka asụsụ Africa nwee ike site na teknụzụ blockchain na ọchịchị nke obodo na-achị.
mission.statement: Iji hụ na asụsụ ọ bụla nke Africa na-eto n'oge dijitalụ, na-ejikọta obodo dị iche iche ma na-echekwa ihe nketa omenala maka ọgbọ ndị na-abịa.

vision.title: Ọhụụ Anyị
vision.description: Anyị na-eche ọdịnihu ebe asụsụ Africa ga-abụ dijitalụ zuru oke, dịnụ, ma na-eto n'ọkwa ụwa.

pillar1.title: Nchekwa Dijitalụ
pillar1.description: Mepụta ebe nchekwa dijitalụ zuru ezu nke asụsụ Africa, gụnyere ihe odide ederede, ihe ndekọ ụda, na ebe omenala.

pillar2.title: Ịnweta Ụwa
pillar2.description: Mee ka asụsụ Africa dịnụ maka ndị na-amụ ihe n'ụwa niile site na teknụzụ na ihe onwunwe agụmakwụkwọ.

problem.title: Ihe Ihe Ịma Anyị Na-eche Ihu

stat1.title: Ihe Ihe Ịma Ede
stat1.description: Ihe karịrị asụsụ 2,000 nke Africa na-eche mbibi ihu, ọtụtụ nwere ọnụnọ dijitalụ ọ bụla.

stat2.title: Mfu Omenala
stat2.description: Na asụsụ ọ bụla furu efu, anyị na-efunahụ ihe ọmụma omenala pụrụ iche, omenala, na echiche ụwa.

stat3.title: Ihe Onwunwe Amachaghị
stat3.description: Enweghị ego, akwụkwọ, na akụrụngwa teknụzụ na-egbochi mgbalị ichekwa asụsụ.

solution.title: Ngwọta Anyị
solution.description: AFRILingua DAO na-eji teknụzụ blockchain na ọchịchị na-achị onwe ya mepụta ikpo okwu na-adịgide adịgide, nke obodo na-achị maka nchekwa na nkwalite asụsụ Africa.

feature1.title: Ọchịchị Na-achị Onwe Ya
feature1.description: Ndị otu obodo na-eme mkpebi site na usoro ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya pụtara ìhè site na iji ịtụ vootu dabere na blockchain.

feature2.title: Akụrụngwa Dijitalụ
feature2.description: Wulite ọba akwụkwọ dijitalụ zuru ezu, ngwaọrụ ntụgharị asụsụ, na ikpo okwu mmụta maka asụsụ Africa.

feature3.title: Ntinye Obodo
feature3.description: Mee ka ndị na-asụ asụsụ, ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ, na ndị na-anụ ọkụ n'obi nye aka na ọdịnaya, kwado ntụgharị asụsụ, ma gbasaa mmata.

feature4.title: Ego Na-adịgide Adịgide
feature4.description: Jiri usoro ego dabere na blockchain iji hụ na nkwado ogologo oge na ụgwọ ziri ezi maka ndị nyere aka.

value1.title: Nchekwa Omenala
value1.description: Anyị kwenyere na asụsụ ọ bụla bụ akụ omenala bara uru nke a ga-echebe ma na-eme ememe.

value2.title: Ịgụnye
value2.description: Anyị na-anabata asụsụ Africa niile, olumba, na obodo asụsụ na nkwanye ùgwù na nkwado nha anya.

value3.title: Ime Ọhụrụ
value3.description: Anyị na-anabata teknụzụ kachasị ọhụrụ iji dozie nsogbu ọdịnala na nchekwa asụsụ.

cta.title: Sonye na Ntụgharị
cta.description: Bụrụ akụkụ nke mgbanwe na-echekwa asụsụ Africa maka ọgbọ ndị na-abịa.

hero.title: Ụzọ Ọganihu Anyị
hero.subtitle: Na-atụ ụzọ gaa n'ọdịnihu asụsụ ọtụtụ nke Africa

phase1.title: Oge Ntọala
phase1.description: Mepụta akụrụngwa isi, usoro ọchịchị, na ntọala obodo mbụ.

milestones.m2: Were ndị otu otu isi na ndị nnọchite anya

outcomes.o2: Obodo na-arụsi ọrụ ike nke ndị otu 100+

phase2.title: Mmepe Ọdịnaya
phase2.description: Wulite akụrụngwa asụsụ zuru ezu ma malite mgbalị dijitalụ.

milestones.m2: Mepụta akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu dijitalụ maka asụsụ 10+
milestones.m3: Mepụta ngwaọrụ ntụgharị asụsụ na API

outcomes.o2: Ọba akwụkwọ ọdịnaya nke obodo na-achị

phase3.title: Mgbasawanye Ikpo Okwu
phase3.description: Mee ka ikpo okwu dị, webata atụmatụ dị elu, ma gbasaa mkpuchi asụsụ.

milestones.m1: Malite ikpo okwu mmụta na nkuzi mmekọrịta
milestones.m3: Jikọta ngwaọrụ asụsụ nke AI na-akwado

outcomes.o2: Ngwa ekwentị maka iOS na Android

phase4.title: Mmetụta Ụwa
phase4.description: Nweta nkwado ụwa ma guzobe AFRILingua dị ka ikpo okwu kacha mma maka asụsụ Africa.

milestones.m1: Rute ndị ọrụ 1 nde na-arụ ọrụ

outcomes.o1: Obodo ụwa nke ndị na-amụ asụsụ
outcomes.o3: Gburugburu na-adịgide adịgide maka nchekwa asụsụ

future.title: Ọhụụ Ogologo Oge
future.description: Njem anyị anaghị akwụsị ebe a. Anyị na-eche ụwa ebe asụsụ Africa ọ bụla na-eto na dijitalụ.

goal1.title: Ịnweta Ụwa Niile
goal1.description: Mee ka asụsụ Africa niile dịnụ maka onye ọ bụla, n'ebe ọ bụla n'ụwa.

goal2.title: Ihe Nketa Omenala
goal2.description: Mepụta ebe nchekwa dijitalụ kachasị zuru ezu nke ihe nketa asụsụ Africa nke etinyere.

goal3.title: Ọgbọ Na-esote
goal3.description: Mee ka ọgbọ ndị na-abịa nwee ike ijikọ na mgbọrọgwụ ha site na teknụzụ.
